## ModelFormConfig interface

Represents a configuration object for a model form

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ModelFormConfig<TState extends {}, TForm extends {}, TFormState extends OptionsFormState<Partial<TState>>> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [actionConverter?](./model-form.modelformconfig.actionconverter.md) | [FormToSaveModelConverter](./model-form.formtosavemodelconverter.md)<!-- -->&lt;TForm, TState, StateAction&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> A custom converter used to convert form to a state action. |
|  [dynamicForm](./model-form.modelformconfig.dynamicform.md) | DynamicForm&lt;TForm, TFormState&gt; | The form being used |
|  [entityId?](./model-form.modelformconfig.entityid.md) | unknown | <i>(Optional)</i> The id of the entity being updated. If null, the form will attempt to create the entity on submit |
|  [stateProp](./model-form.modelformconfig.stateprop.md) | Prop&lt;TState&gt; | The state property corresponding with the model |
